room_title: Escape room "Runaway Train" by Breakout Games - Atlanta in Atlanta
review: We had the best date night with friends! This was challenging and exciting! Our game master was awesome. We will definitely be back to play again.

room_title: Escape room "Runaway Train" by Breakout Games - Atlanta in Atlanta
review: Game was fun. It was just me and my girlfriend. Games are meant for more than two people. Pay attention to detail and just go in order. It was a great time either way.

room_title: Escape room "Runaway Train" by Breakout Games - Atlanta in Atlanta
review: I really enjoyed my time at Breakout Atlanta. My booking experience was easy, and upon arrival everyone was very friendly and made sure we were set. The game was so much fun, and our game master definitely gave us the best clues to get out!

room_title: Escape room "Runaway Train" by Breakout Games - Atlanta in Atlanta
review: My friends and I came here for a good time and a challenge and we definitely left satisfied. We will definitely be back asap!

room_title: Escape room "Runaway Train" by Breakout Games - Atlanta in Atlanta
review: Was wayyyy more fun than I had thought. We weren't smart enough to escape in time but we were so close and they let us finish which I appreciated! The staff was great! Cannot wait to go back!
